name: Acton Gould
reviews: I have previously ordered this honey many times and loved it before, however it seems like the cost of this honey is increasing but the quality is going down day by day.

name: Joelle Garza
reviews: Unfortunately this honey caused allergic reactions (skin rashes) and when added to tea it made my drink very cloudy with awful smell. Won’t buy again.

name: Hyacinth Lynn
reviews: The honey had crystallised and the texture was horrible!.I bought this as a gift and the recipient was really disappointed.There is no way this honey is going to be eaten ! Its a kilo jar.

name: Asher Ray
reviews: First Jar:I have been trying different honeys from different brands at different price ranges. So far this was the best honey I tasted. Old fashioned, real, nice smelling honey. Great!

name: Jackson Hurst
reviews: Wow, this is fantastic! Very smooth but still 'dark' taste - I have a bought a considerable number of honeys in my life (and forest or honeydew is usually what I go for), but this is quite unique and among the best I have tasted so far.

name: Jackson Hurst
reviews: Unfortunately this honey caused allergic reactions (skin rashes) and when added to tea it made my drink very cloudy with awful smell. Won’t buy again.

name: Jackson Hurst
reviews: Unfortunately this honey caused allergic reactions (skin rashes) and when added to tea it made my drink very cloudy with awful smell. Won’t buy again.

name: Jackson Hurst
reviews: Knew this is pure raw unprocessed honey from the moment of opening the jar (zero plastic packaging!!!!! - metal lid and special cardboard box to prevent breaking the jar in transit)

name: Jackson Hurst
reviews: Packaging was fantastic, very secure and item arrived in perfect condition considering it's a glass jar.
